BackstoryDef.title: Artificial Human
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] replaced a human being, taking over their entire life. Unfortunately, their mistake was in not eliminating all witnesses and they were forced to flee to the Rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Archotect Infiltrator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was created by an archotech to infiltrate human society and report back. [PAWN_pronoun] designer went a bit overboard on the empathy emulation thinking it would help...

BackstoryDef.title: Assassin Unit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was designed to find and kill targets without exception or mercy. Extra features make [PAWN_pronoun] an excellent killer, but not someone you'd want watching your kids.

BackstoryDef.title: Frontline Assaulter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was made to the be a defName part of the frontline assaults for a major Glittertech empire. Eventually they were replaced by nwer models.

BackstoryDef.title: House Madam
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lasted long enough in the trade to take over their place of business. The Rim is just a new place to find customers and break up brawls.

BackstoryDef.title: Engineered Scientist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s intended role was to serve as a researcher for replicating Glitterworld technologies. The lack of social development however resulted in a being that cares only for logic and nothing for life.

BackstoryDef.title: Diplomatic Envoy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was created to serve as a diplomatic envoy for missions too dangerous for a human. [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_pronoun] kindred's disposable nature led to them developing some "issues".

BackstoryDef.title: Mechanoid Sympathizer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loathes humanity with a passion and wants to be one with the machine overlords. [PAWN_nameDef] can't be happy until all their synthetic organics are replaced with artifical parts, even if they need to rip them off still-living humans to get them.
